(The following stuff Unitron says isn't mumbo jumbo, Unitron is an RPG 
character I've used for several years and I've planned out his history 
carefully.  Just thought I'd tell ya that Robo, so it didn't look like I was 
just making crap up.  There can be only one!)

Unitron:



Unitron threw his head back in laughter.  "Six hundred years?  How pathetic.  
I've been doing this for nearly 10 million years, Autobrat!" he stopped 
chuckling when he looked and was hit with Hot Rod's foot, and fell to his 
back.

"Not bad, not bad for some Autobot punk who got the greatest Autobot leader 
killed." Unitron said with a smile, pushing up with all his might on one 
hand, sending him launching in a drop kick at Hot Rod's chest.
